item.title: You Won't Believe What This Grill Has to Say About 'This Grill Is Not a Home' Lyrics!
item.description: Introduction A Background of the song: “This Grill Is Not a Home” is a song by the alternative rock band, The National The song was released in 201 as part of their album Sleep Well Beast, and has become a fan favorite The song is poetic and haunting, with lyrics that explore themes of loss, longing, and the idea of home B. Overview of the lyrics: The lyrics of “This Grill Is Not a Home” tell the story of a person who is struggling to find a sense of home in the world.
